job_purpose: To assist with helpdesk support, gain exposure to IT systems, and participate in small tech projects while learning from experienced IT staff.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Assist with helpdesk support, troubleshooting hardware and software issues
Gain exposure to IT systems, networks, and security practices
Help maintain internal documentation and user guides
Participate in small tech projects, audits, or rollouts
Learn from and shadow experienced IT staff in day-to-day operations
required_qualifications: Currently studying IT, Computer Science, or a related field
Basic knowledge of computers, operating systems, and troubleshooting
Willingness to learn, ask questions, and take initiative
Must be available for a 1-month full-time or part-time internship, with flexibility for ongoing casual work (1–2 days/week)
company_details: KAEFER Integrated Services delivers asset integrity solutions to clients across energy, industrial, and infrastructure sectors. The company values safety, quality, teamwork, and continuous improvement. They offer a supportive and forward-thinking work environment.
